By observing the Sabbath day wherein God rested, the knowledge of God would be preserved. It is a "sign between Me and you that ye may know that I am the Lord that doth sanctify you." Those who keep the Sabbath holy as the Lord has specified, reveal that they are His peculiar people, and that He who 


                                    -86- 

made the heavens and the earth is their God.--Ms 139, 1903, pp. 7, 8. ("The Message in Revelation," typed October 23, 1903.)
